title: spec: define that circular imports are illegal
body:
The spec doesn't say this, although the implementations enforce it. The language should
honor the implementations.

The spec says: "It is illegal for a package to import itself or to import a package
without referring to any of its exported identifiers."

Easy fix:

"It is illegal for a package to import itself, either directly or transitively, or
to import a package without referring to any of its exported identifiers."
